this_title: 君とママとカウボーイ
introduction: His name is George. He lives in the house which his dead grandmother left. He has been working at the wholesale market near by the Port of Yokohama. Physical labor, girlfriends, alarm clock… His life seems just uneventful. As the graduation film of the director Yusuke INABA, this film was made by only four crew members including himself.
chinese_title: 君とママとカウボーイ
